document_title: SAM and LSAD remote protocols man in the middle vulnerability (Badlock)

note.text: The Security Account Manager Remote Protocol [MS-SAMR] and theÂ Local Security Authority (Domain Policy) Remote Protocol [MS-LSAD]Â are both vulnerable to man in the middle attacks. These protocols areÂ typically available on all Windows installationsÂ as well as every Samba server.
note.title: Summary

note.text: An MitM attacker could force a downgrade of the authentication level of the SAM and LSAD channels and impersonate an authenticated user.
note.title: Impact

note.text: All the Fortinet products are confirmed to be not affected.
